verses.text: \w I|strong="H1004"\w* \w will|strong="H1004"\w* extol \w you|strong="H1004"\w*, \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w*, \w for|strong="H1004"\w* \w you|strong="H1004"\w* \w have|strong="H1004"\w* raised \w me|strong="H1004"\w* up, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w have|strong="H1004"\w* \w not|strong="H1732"\w* \w made|strong="H1732"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* foes \w to|strong="H1004"\w* rejoice \w over|strong="H1732"\w* \w me|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* cried \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* healed \w me|strong="H7311"\w*.

\w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w*, you \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H3068"\w* up \w my|strong="H3068"\w* soul \w from|strong="H3068"\w* Sheol.\f + \fr 30:3 \ft Sheol is the place of the dead.\f* You \w have|strong="H3068"\w* kept me alive, \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w should|strong="H3068"\w* not \w go|strong="H3068"\w* down \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* pit.

Sing praise \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w*, \w you|strong="H4480"\w* saints \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w*. \w Give|strong="H2421"\w* thanks \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* holy name.

\w For|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* anger \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w but|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* moment. \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w favor|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* lifetime. Weeping \w may|strong="H3068"\w* stay \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* night, \w but|strong="H3068"\w* joy comes \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* morning.

\w As|strong="H3588"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w me|strong="H3588"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* said \w in|strong="H3885"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* prosperity, “\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H2416"\w* never \w be|strong="H2416"\w* moved.”

\w You|strong="H5769"\w*, \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w*, when \w you|strong="H5769"\w* favored \w me|strong="H5769"\w*, made my mountain stand strong; \w but|strong="H4131"\w* when \w you|strong="H5769"\w* hid \w your|strong="H5769"\w* face, \w I|strong="H7959"\w* was troubled.

\w I|strong="H6440"\w* cried \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*, \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w*. \w I|strong="H6440"\w* \w made|strong="H1961"\w* supplication \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*:

“What profit \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* destruction, \w if|strong="H2603"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H3068"\w* \w down|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* pit? \w Shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* dust praise \w you|strong="H7121"\w*? \w Shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H7121"\w* declare \w your|strong="H3068"\w* truth?

\w Hear|strong="H5046"\w*, \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H1818"\w* have mercy \w on|strong="H3381"\w* \w me|strong="H5046"\w*. \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w*, \w be|strong="H1818"\w* \w my|strong="H5046"\w* helper.”

\w You|strong="H1961"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w turned|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* mourning \w into|strong="H1961"\w* dancing \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H1961"\w*. \w You|strong="H1961"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* removed \w my|strong="H8085"\w* sackcloth, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* clothed \w me|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* gladness,

\w to|strong="H2015"\w* \w the|strong="H6605"\w* end that \w my|strong="H6605"\w* heart may sing praise \w to|strong="H2015"\w* \w you|strong="H8057"\w*, \w and|strong="H8242"\w* \w not|strong="H6605"\w* be silent. \w Yahweh|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H6605"\w* God, I will \w give|strong="H2015"\w* thanks \w to|strong="H2015"\w* \w you|strong="H8057"\w* forever!
